title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 1, ch. VI, subch. G, art. 1, pt. 319 - Definitions And Standards Of Identity Or Composition
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 1, ch. VI, subch. G, art. 1, pt. 319 - Definitions And Standards Of Identity Or Composition

State Regulations

General (§ 319.1)

Raw Meat Products (§ 319.15 to 319.29)

Cooked Meats (§ 319.80 to 319.81)

Cured Meats, Unsmoked and Smoked (§ 319.100 to 319.105)

Sausage Generally: Fresh Sausage (§ 319.140 to 319.145)

Uncooked, Smoked Sausage (§ 319.160)

Cooked, Smoked Sausage (§ 319.180 to 319.181)

Other Cooked Sausage (§ 319.200)

Luncheon Meat, Loaves and Jellied Products (§ 319.260 to 319.261)

Cooked Meat Specialties, Puddings and Nonspecific Loaves (§ 319.280 to 319.281)

Canned, Frozen or Dehydrated Meat Food Products (§ 319.300 to 319.313)

Meat Food Entree Products, Pies and Turnovers (§ 319.500)

Meat Snacks, Hors d'Oeuvres, Pizza and Specialty Items (§ 319.600)

Fats, Oils, Shortenings (§ 319.700 to 319.703)

Meat Soups, Soup Mixes, Broths, Stocks, Extracts (§ 319.720 to 319.721)

Meat Salads and Meat Spreads (§ 319.760 to 319.762)

Miscellaneous (§ 319.880 to 319.881)

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 1, ch. VI, subch. G, art. 1, pt. 319

Statutory authority: Agriculture and Markets Law, §96-s

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
